name: Global Research Conference on Plant Science and Biotechnology
content: Foster Research invites you to attend the event “Global Research Conference on Plant Science and Biotechnology (GRCPSB2024)” in Dubai, UAE from November 18-20, 2024\. The theme of the conference is “Grand Challenges of Plant Science and Biotechnology: Health, Food Security and Global Warming” The GRCPSB2024 will be a 3-days conference aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Plant Biotechnology and Development. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for Plant and Agriculture Associations and Societies, Soil Science and Agricultural Students, Scientists, Agricultural Universities Faculty and Students, Seed Science and Technology Breeders and Scientists, Soil Science Researchers, Soil Science Faculty, Business Entrepreneurs, Training Institutes Faculties, Seed Science and Technology Breeders and Scientists, Soil science and soil-plant Nutrition Faculties, Researchers of Forest Science, Researchers of R&D Laboratories to present and discuss. The International Plant Science Conference will feature a comprehensive discussion on plant-microbe interactions and their implications for sustainable agriculture. Recent studies have highlighted the crucial role of microbes in promoting plant growth, increasing nutrient uptake, and providing protection against environmental stresses. A wide-ranging scientific program consisting of plenary lectures, keynote lectures, Invited lectures, parallel sessions, as well as poster sessions for young scientists covering all topics in Plant Science and Biotechnology. Moreover, the conference offers a valuable platform to create new contacts in the field of Plant Science and Biotechnology, by providing valuable networking time for you to meet great personnel in the field. We look forward to seeing you at GRCPSB2024 in Dubai, UAE. Sincerely, GRCPSB2024 Scientific Organizing Committee
